Operation 'ListLegacyContent' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Added summary for quick reference, clarified that this is a read-only list operation with pagination support, and noted the absence of side effects to help AI agents understand this is a safe operation to call.

data.current_description: Retrieve a list of Legacy Contents belonging to the account used to make the request
data.summary_suggestion: List legacy content for authenticated account
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of legacy content items associated with the authenticated account. Supports filtering and pagination through query parameters. Returns an array of legacy content objects with metadata. No side effects - this is a read-only operation.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary entirely, making it difficult for AI agents to quickly understand its purpose. The description is vague about what parameters are available (3 parameters mentioned but not described), what the response structure contains, and pagination behavior. Added summary for quick reference, clarified that this is a read-only list operation with pagination support, and noted the absence of side effects to help AI agents understand this is a safe operation to call.

message: Operation 'CreateApprovalCreate' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Operation has no summary or description. The endpoint path indicates this creates a WhatsApp-specific approval request. Added clarity about what is being approved, what inputs are required (Content Sid), what is returned, and the side effect of initiating the approval workflow for AI agent understanding.

data.description_suggestion: Creates an approval request for WhatsApp content. Submits the specified content for WhatsApp platform approval review. Requires the Content Sid and approval request details. Returns the created approval request resource with status and metadata. This initiates the approval workflow for the content.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description. The endpoint path indicates this creates a WhatsApp-specific approval request. Added clarity about what is being approved, what inputs are required (Content Sid), what is returned, and the side effect of initiating the approval workflow for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'FetchApprovalFetch' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is minimal and lacks details about what is returned. Enhanced to clarify the response includes status, history, and rejection reasons, helping AI agents understand what information they'll receive.

data.current_description: Fetch a Content resource's approval status by its unique Content Sid
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the approval status for a Content resource by its unique Content Sid. Returns the approval request details including current status, approval history, and any rejection reasons if applicable. Useful for checking whether content has been approved, rejected, or is pending review.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is minimal and lacks details about what is returned. Enhanced to clarify the response includes status, history, and rejection reasons, helping AI agents understand what information they'll receive.

message: Operation 'FetchContent' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too minimal and doesn't explain what data is returned. Enhanced to clarify the response includes metadata, body, attachments, and approval status for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Fetch a Content resource by its unique Content Sid
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a Content resource by its unique Content Sid. Returns the complete content object including metadata, body, media attachments, and approval status. Use this to access stored content details for review or processing.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too minimal and doesn't explain what data is returned. Enhanced to clarify the response includes metadata, body, attachments, and approval status for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'DeleteContent' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. data.current_description: Deletes a Content resource
data.description_suggestion: Deletes a Content resource by its unique Sid. Permanently removes the content from the account. This action cannot be undone. Associated approval requests and history may also be affected.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks important side effect information about permanence and impact on related resources. Enhanced to warn about irreversibility and potential cascading effects for AI agent safety.

message: Operation 'CreateContent' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too generic. Enhanced to explain what inputs are accepted (body, media, metadata), what is returned (Sid, status), and the next step in the workflow for AI agent guidance.

data.current_description: Create a Content resource
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new Content resource with the provided content data. Accepts content body, media attachments, and metadata in the request. Returns the created content object with assigned Sid and initial approval status. The content is ready for approval submission after creation.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too generic. Enhanced to explain what inputs are accepted (body, media, metadata), what is returned (Sid, status), and the next step in the workflow for AI agent guidance.

message: Operation 'ListContent' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks details about pagination, filtering capabilities, and what each returned item contains. Enhanced to clarify pagination support and response structure for better AI agent usability.

data.current_description: Retrieve a list of Contents belonging to the account used to make the request
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all Content resources belonging to the authenticated account. Supports filtering and pagination parameters. Returns an array of content objects with metadata and approval status for each. Useful for browsing, searching, or auditing account content.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks details about pagination, filtering capabilities, and what each returned item contains. Enhanced to clarify pagination support and response structure for better AI agent usability.

message: Operation 'ListContentAndApprovals' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description mentions approval statuses but lacks clarity on response structure and use cases. Enhanced to explain this is a combined view, clarify pagination support, and provide context for when to use this versus separate content/approval endpoints.

data.current_description: Retrieve a list of Contents with approval statuses belonging to the account used to make the request
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of Content resources with their associated approval statuses for the authenticated account. Returns an array of combined content and approval objects, enabling efficient review of content approval workflows. Supports filtering and pagination parameters. Useful for monitoring approval progress across multiple content items.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description mentions approval statuses but lacks clarity on response structure and use cases. Enhanced to explain this is a combined view, clarify pagination support, and provide context for when to use this versus separate content/approval endpoints.
